Sentencas: Proton-conducting oxides have garnered much attention as electrolyte materials of electrochemical devices operating at intermediate temperatures ranging 400-700 degrees C. For the implementation, quantifying the transport number of oxygen ions is crucial to predict the fuel utilization efficiency of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: The acceptor-doped LaYbO3 proton conductors are one of the candidates for the electrolyte material of electrochemical devices such as SOFCs because of their high pure proton conduction.
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: However, the oxide ion conductivity in this material is not quantified yet.
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: Here, we evaluate the tracer diffusion coefficient (D*) of 5 mol % Ba-doped LaYbO3 by the oxygen isotope exchange and depth profile technique using secondary ion mass spectrometry.
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: It is found that the oxygen ion conductivities in this material are lower than 10(-4)
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: We also visualize the domain of dominant conduction in this material.
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method

Sentencas: It reveals that proton conduction is dominant in fairly wide areas of the atmospheric condition, in particular below 600 degrees C, suggesting that the Ba-doped LaYbO3 is suitable for the SOFC electrolyte in terms of transport number.
Titulo: Determination of Oxide Ion Conductivity in Ba-Doped LaYbO3 Proton-Conducting Perovskites via an Oxygen Isotope Exchange Method
